title: Degradation of carbamazepine and sulfamethoxazole in water by dielectric barrier discharge plasma coupled with a far UV-C (222 nm) system
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00564C, Paper
Kiran Ahlawat, Ramavtar Jangra, Ram Prakash
Degradation of sulfamethoxazole (SMX) and carbamazepine (CBZ) using plasma and UV 222 coupling and its probable degradation mechanism.
